divs: sighting detailsthere was an oval shaped green\blue light with an orange tail headed upwards diagonaly. it only lasted about 10 seconds and then just seemed to vanish once it got higher up. the lady i was with saw it aswell and my boyfriends father (who was on the other side of town) saw the exact same thing. at first i thought it may be a meteorite but all the ones i have ever seen have looked as if they were "falling" this did not "fall" this was slowly moving up past the clouds in a diagonal direction and vanished.
Summary: ball of light slowly moving diagnaly upwards.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Matthews
There were no other sightings in Matthews on or around October 24th 2011
